description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Understand clearly about the company's products, cooperate with Production Dept. to develop new products in accordance with customer needs.
              
              - Achievement of sales targets and business goals of the company. Prepare sales report, update list of potential customers.
              
              - To establish and keep a good relationship with customers.
              
              - Join meetings with clients, receive their requests and make minutes of the meeting.
              
              - Follow up to ensure factories make samples accordingly.
              
              - Contact QA/QC at factories to get all information of products, tests and inspections reports, etc…
              
              - Coordinate shipments with the Logistics Dept. and the clients.
              
              - Fill in client’s documents (Technical sheet, Product sheet, Photo offer form…) when requested.
              
              - Collaborate with Supply Chain Management for the order details: load ability, ETD, loading plans, etc.
              
              - Join Pre-Production meetings to ensure quality of mass production.
              
              -  Coordinate with QC "Inline" and "Final" inspections.
              
              - Join clients for factory visits and showroom.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              *** Job Requirement
              
              - English is a MUST. Speaking, writing and reading.
              
              - Experience in furniture sector in advantage.
              
              - Have a good knowledge of front office procedures: PI's, CI's, offers, etc.
              
              - Proficient in MS Office.
              
              - Negotiation and problem solving skills.
              
              - Pro-active, quickly adaptable to working environment and CAN DO attitude.
              
              - Able to work under high pressure.
              

              *** Benefits:
              
              - Total salary: negotiable, according to candidate value.
              
              - Work in a dynamic and friendly environment for an international company.
              
              - Opportunity to develop a career in a dynamic industry.
              
              - Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance according to Labor Law.
              
              - Yearly annual leave, birthday.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
